EmailTemplate.name: Invite to private tour
EmailTemplate.subject: St Andrew's Cathedral School: Private Tour
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Thank you for your recent tour booking.
As your enquiry relates to Year {!Lead.Year_Group__c} next year, would you like to come in for a private tour? If so, let me know and I can arrange a time that suits you.
Regards
Robyn
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Manager
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
direct 9286 9552 mobile 0404 884 852 email RPedley@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
